Radar plot

gs_radar.Rd

This is a copy of gs_radar from GeneTonic where the labels of gene sets are converted to parameters

Usage

gs_radar(
  res_enrich,
  res_enrich2 = NULL,
  label1 = "scenario 1",
  label2 = "scenario 2",
  n_gs = 20,
  p_value_column = "gs_pvalue"
)

Arguments

res_enrich

DE results from comparison 1

res_enrich2

DE results from comparison 2

label1

label for comparison 1

label2

label for comparison 2

n_gs

number of gene sets (default = 20)

p_value_column

column to use as p-value (default = 'gs_pvalue')

Value

ggplot handle
